授業方法:
Week 1 sessions 1-3 will be held face-to-face. Week 2 and onwards will be held simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast. Please stand by in Zoom at least 5 minutes before the class starts. In addition to teacher instruction, students will work individually, with partners, in small groups and in whole class activities to develop communication skills, and engage in independent/group research for oral and written assignments.

(Information ONLY for students permitted to take classes online: Where necessary and only for students permitted to take classes online the university will provide the means to participate in the classes on the day and time scheduled simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast.)
